message: @kennethreitz yes, they had a poster session and they got started on writting a "real" app for it. The first one was web2py :) They are from the schooltool.org project. I have their cards and will get in touch with them to see where they will end up releasing the code.
I saw a sprint for a project called PyBook. Someone told me it was a project aiming to help technical authors write books and such with reST?
I had to leave before the sprints started. Is that true? I can't find anything on it online.
The full name is pyBookBuilder, I just couldn't fit it all on the card. The PyCon sprint projects page should have more info though.
Thanks guys. I'm looking forward to it's publication.
